Text: And finally, OVO's plan to buy SSE's energy business for £500 million helped SSE shares to rise 17.5p to 1183.5p  -  with the latter now hoping to focus on its power generation and energy networks business instead.
Cause: And finally, OVO's plan to buy SSE's energy business for £500 million
Effect: SSE shares to rise 17.5p to 1183.5p  -  with the latter now hoping to focus on its power generation and energy networks business instead.
Sentence: <e1>And finally, OVO's plan to buy SSE's energy business for £500 million</e1> helped <e2>SSE shares to rise 17.5p to 1183.5p  -  with the latter now hoping to focus on its power generation and energy networks business instead.</e2>
